name: assassin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who kills a famous or important person, usually for political reasons or in exchange for money: John Lennon's assassin was Mark Chapman. She hired an assassin to eliminate her rival.
More examplesFewer examplesThe assassination could do serious damage to the fragile peace agreement that was signed last month.The assassination of the Archduke Ferdinand started off the first World War.President Kennedy's assassination had far-reaching repercussions.The assassination was reported in all the newspapers.The book describes the train of events that led up to the assassination.
